document.full_text: a lawsuit against cbs and tony award productions claims that producers are to blame for rocker bret michaels' 2009 on-stage injury because they failed to tell him how to exit the stage safely.
document.title: bret michaels sues cbs, tonys over on-stage mishap
lines_and_colors: a lawsuit against cbs and tony award productions claims that producers are to blame for rocker bret michaels' 2009 on-stage injury because they failed to tell him how to exit the stage safely.
